skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 50% chance to place up to 2 extra hits if the target is under a [Hex] debuff. The chance to place each extra hit is calculated individually per hit.

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Will ignore [Unkillable] buffs and [Shield] buffs if targets are under a [Hex] debuff. 

Places an [Unkillable] buff on this Champion for 1 turn if this attack kills an enemy without a [Hex] debuff. Places an [Unkillable] buff for 2 turns instead if this attack kills an enemy under a [Hex] debuff.
skills.name: Inexorable End

Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
